rooms.description: Spacious living area with floor-to-ceiling windows on the south and west facades to ensure maximum natural light in accordance with Vastu principles.
Open dining area adjacent to the living room, incorporating ample daylight from the large windows and a seamless transition to outdoor spaces.
Modern kitchen with floor-to-ceiling windows on one side for improved ventilation and natural lighting, designed following local building norms and Vastu considerations.
Primary bedroom with floor-to-ceiling windows facing east to capture the morning light, ensuring privacy and adherence to Vastu principles.
Secondary bedroom with floor-to-ceiling windows on the north facade to balance the energy flow in line with Vastu guidelines.
Well-lit bathroom adjoining the master bedroom with proper ventilation and natural light.

openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling window ensuring maximum daylight in the living room and dining areas.
Floor-to-ceiling window providing light and ventilation for the kitchen area.
Main entrance adhering to local building codes with a welcoming design and secure access.
